name: European Breakfast Cereal Association
membership: Member of FoodDrinkEurope, the European food and drink federation
goal:
The European Breakfast Cereal Association represents the breakfast cereal and oat milling industry in the EU. Its members are nine national associations in eight European countries and fourteen companies.
CEEREAL is proactive in anticipating potential issues of relevance to the sector, and provides input on issues that affect the breakfast cereal and oat milling industries.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: DG SANTE and DG AGRI policies affecting the breakfast cereals and oat milling industry.
